content: this is a summary of a legal case in slovenia where two parties are responsible for sharing the costs the case lasted for 6 months and 4 days and resulted in the division of assets between the exspouses the total value of the assets is 200000 eur and includes real estate properties apartments business spaces and a boat the plaintiff will receive a certain share of the assets while the defendant will receive a different share the decision was made based on a specific law called the civil procedure act and the details of the settlement are confidential
